Package prkmodel.repast

Class RepastMicroglia

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.AbstractNervousSystemElement
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultMicroglia
prkmodel.repast.RepastMicroglia
All Implemented Interfaces:
Microglia, NervousSystemElement
public final class RepastMicroglia extends DefaultMicroglia
Extends the functionality of DefaultMicroglia to integrate with the Repast Simphony framework. Represents a microglia in the simulation that produces cytokines.
Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95

  • Constructor Details

    • RepastMicroglia

      public RepastMicroglia(NervousSystem nsystem, double x, double y, double z)
      Constructs a new RepastMicroglia with the specified nervous system and position.
      Parameters:
      nsystem - the nervous system this microglia belongs to
      x - the X coordinate of the microglia
      y - the Y coordinate of the microglia
      z - the Z coordinate of the microglia
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the nervous system is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the coordinates are invalid

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Schedules the microglia to produce cytokines at each simulation step. This method is scheduled to run at each simulation step.
